# setPosition(_:forDirectionPadElement:)

**Instance Method**

Changes the value of a directional pad element in the virtual controller.

## Declaration

```swift
func setPosition(_ position: CGPoint, forDirectionPadElement element: String)
```

## Parameters

- **position**: A point with `x` and `y` values in the range `[0.0, 1.0]`.
- **element**: The name of the directional pad element to update.

## Discussion

Use this method to update the value of a directional pad in the virtual controller when you set the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCVirtualController/Configuration/isHidden] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] and present your own virtual controller interface.

## Presenting a custom interface

- **setValue(_:forButtonElement:)**: Changes the value of a button element in the virtual controller.
